business.headline: Increased TDS limit, exemption for NSS: Big relief for senior citizens Budget 2025 announced major tax reforms for senior citizens, reducing their tax burden and giving a boost to their savings.

Will boost savings, investment, consumption, growth: PM on BudgetPrime Minister Narendra Modi praised the Union Budget 2025, calling it a "force multiplier" that will boost savings, investment, consumption, and growth.
TDS reforms announced, limit for senior citizens doubledBudget 2025: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced an increase in the TDS threshold in the Union Budget 2025.

Everyone's praising you, Budget is very good: PM praises Nirmala SitharamanAccording to sources, the Prime Minister walked up to the bench where Nirmala Sitharaman was seated and expressed his gratitude for presenting her eighth and the Modi 3.0 government's first Budget today.

No tax payable up to Rs 12 lakh income: Budget bonanza for middle classFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced that taxpayers with salaries up to Rs 12 lakh would not be required to pay tax in the new tax regime.
New Income Tax Bill next week, will focus on easing taxpayer convenience: Finance MinisterFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman to unveil new Income Tax Bill next week.
Boost for MSMEs, classification investment cap to be hiked 2.5 times The Indian government would strengthen the country's MSME sector.

Middle class hero with massive tax relief, Bihar big beneficiaryFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced big reforms focused on income tax relief for the middle class in addition to major reforms in agriculture, with Bihar in focus.

Budget for common man, says PM Modi at Cabinet meet: SourcesBudget 2025-2026 is likely to provide a much-needed boost to the middle class amid high inflation with the nation's GDP growth projected to slow down to a four-year low of 6.4 per cent.

Will stock market investors get tax relief from this budget?Capital gains tax and stock market investors: Experts anticipate that Budget 2025 should not announce new taxes, instead, provide tax rebates to boost the consumption levels and revive market sentiment.

Sensex gains over 300 points, Nifty goes past 23,600  Live UpdatesStock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex was up by 278.80 points to 77,779.37, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 81.80 points to 23,590.20 as of 11:29 AM.

Use this income tax calculator to check your tax outgo under both regimesCalculate income tax online: Experts suggest that 'Modi 3.0' may introduce measures to make the new income tax regime more appealing to taxpayers.

Commercial LPG cylinder rates slashed by Rs 7 ahead of Union BudgetThe rate of 19 kg commercial LPG cylinders has been reduced by Rs 7 ahead of the Union Budget 2025-26. A commercial LPG cylinder will now be available in Delhi for Rs 1,797.

Budget 2025: Is stock market open for trading today?Stock market today: The Budget is one of the most important events for the stock market, with policy changes and fiscal measures often leading to sharp movements in stock prices.

Why middle class can expect tax relief todayUnion Budget 2025 Expectations: The government is likely to roll out schemes that focus on offering economic and tax relief to the middle class, poor and women.

Sensex, Nifty rally as markets ride consumer goods wave ahead of BudgetSensex Nifty rise ahead of Budget 2025: The S&P BSE Sensex surged 740.76 points to end at 77,500.57, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 258.90 points to close at 23,508.40.

What Economic Survey has to say on office hours amid work-life balance debateThe pre-Budget Economic Survey's findings come amid an ongoing debate over extended workweeks, sparked by recent remarks from business leaders advocating 70-to 90-hour workweeks.

India's GDP growth projected at 6.3-6.8% for fiscal 2025-26: Economic SurveyThe Economic Survey said that the manufacturing sector faced pressures due to weak global demand and domestic seasonal conditions.

Ibrahim Ali Khan-Khushi Kapoor ready for 'Nadaaniyan' in his debut Netflix filmIbrahim Ali Khan announced his debut film, titled Nadaaniyan, with Khushi Kapoor on Saturday. It's a Netflix film directed by Shauna Gautam.

Netflix India's Tanya Bami and Prime Video India's Nikhil Madhok decode how they green-light a sequel in this week's Cinematic Saturday.

Pic: Emily in Paris actor Lily Collins, husband Charlie McDowell welcome baby girlActor Lily Collins and director Charlie McDowell have become parents to a baby girl via surrogate. They shared the happy news on social media, along with a picture of the baby.

Marco OTT release: When and where to watch Unni Mukundan's gory thrillerMarco OTT Release Date: After having a phenomenal run at the box office, the Malayalam gore film Marco is set to release on OTT. Starring Unni Mukundan in the lead role, the film will release on Sony LIV in February.

For the love of Korean variety shows In this week's installment of Weekly K-Fix, we discuss a specific genre of Korean entertainment -- their variety shows. From superstars such as BTS and Seventeen, to the beloved MC Yoo Jae-Suk, everyone has appeared in them. Here's a quick look at why they are so popular in South Korea.

Jaideep Ahlawat discusses the 'homosexuality' scene from Paatal Lok 2Actors Jaideep Ahlawat and Tillotama Shome discuss what makes their characters in the show Paatal Lok 2 so extraordinary and rich. In an exclusive interview with India Today digital, the two underscore the importance of playing Hathi Ram Chaudhary, and Meghna Barua, in a series which is based in Nagaland.

Stranger Things S5: Millie Bobby goes missing in latest poster from showA new poster of Stranger Things Season 5 is out. The picture features lead star Millie Bobby Brown in it. A release date of the show is yet to be announced.

However, she did not start her career as a singer, she was an actor for a famous Disney show, Boy Meets World. Let's take a look back at Sabrina's remarkable evolution over the years.

Sitarist Anoushka Shankar to present at the 67th Grammy premiere ceremonySitarist Anoushka Shankar will be a presenter at the 67th Grammy Premiere Ceremony. The event will precede the main Grammy Awards.

general news.headline: Bihar gets big pie of Nirmala Sitharaman's Budget in election yearBudget 2025: Bihar, which is being ruled by the Nitish Kumar-led JD(U) and the BJP, will go to polls in November. Sitharaman also turned up in Parliament wearing a Madhubani art print saree to present the Union Budget 2025.

Thaw in ties? Maldives gets highest increase in Budget. Bangladesh sees...Budget 2025: Maldives, which saw a cut in allocation in 2024 amid strained ties, saw a 28% increase in outlay in the 2025 Budget that was presented by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Saturday.

Changes in income tax rates, slabs in Budget. This is how you stand to gainFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman overhauled income tax rates and slabs in Budget 2025-26 to bring relief to the salaried middle class. Here's how much you will be saving now if you are in the new income tax regime.

Is this government's final push for people to quit old income tax regime?The Finance Minister gave salaried individuals a moment of joy with the news that those earning up to Rs 12 lakh a year will pay no tax — but only if they're willing to embrace the new tax regime. And if you were hoping to stay loyal to the old tax regime, sorry, no goodies for you!

Expansion of IITs, medical colleges, big push for AI in education in Budget 2025Budget 2025: The Finance Minister announced plans for the establishment of five national Centres of Excellence for AI in Education, developed through global partnerships. An additional 10,000 seats will be added in medical colleges and hospitals across in the coming year.

What is new Income Tax Bill, how is it different from tax cuts in Budget 2025?With state governments handing out freebies to the poor leading to despondency in the middle-class, it was assumed that Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman would have no option but to make a big move to change the mood of the middle-class.

Sky Force crosses Rs 100 crore at box office, Akshay Kumar's first in 6 yearsAkshay Kumar and Veer Pahariya-starrer Sky Force crossed the benchmark of Rs 100 crore on its eighth day at the box office. This is Akshay's first film in six years, after Good Newwz, to have achieved the feat.

Shami is coming along really well, might play next match: MorkelMorne Morkel assures Mohammed Shami's fitness is on track, hinting at his possible return to India's playing XI for the fifth T20I against England after only one appearence in the series so far.

Shivam Sharma picked up a five-wicket haul for Delhi, while Sumit Mathur was awarded Player of the Match.

Kevin Pietersen extends support to Harshit Rana after concussion-sub controversyFormer England cricketer Kevin Pietersen extended support to Harshit Rana after his concussion substitute controversy during the fourth T20I against England in Pune.

Concussion controversy: Who said what as India captain keeps mum after 4th T20IIndia captain Suryakumar Yadav kept mum on the concussion substitute controversy after the hosts clinched the T20I series in Pune on Friday, January 31. Take a look at what the experts and top players said, as an odd set of circumstances left a sour taste despite the series win.

Harshit Rana not like-for-like replacement for Shivam Dube: Jos Buttler India vs England, 4th T20I: England captain Jos Buttler said Harshit Rana was not a like-for-like replacement for Shivam Dube in the fourth T20I of the five-match series in Pune.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
